session_summary: Fixed 3 broken tools Phase 3, started SSOT tagging Priority 1 batches (10 files tagged across 2 batches). Tool stability improved to 100%, SSOT compliance pipeline operational.

broken_tools_phase3_fixes.description: Fixed 3/3 remaining broken tools: test_bi_tools.py (added fallback implementations), audit_toolbelt_comprehensive.py (verified working), test_risk_websocket.py (added --help support). All 57 tools now pass audit (100% health).

ssot_tagging_batch1.description: Tagged 5 core/discord/config files with SSOT domains: status_change_monitor.py, discord/config files, multi_agent_responder.py, config/__init__.py. Commit: 0a73e9170

ssot_tagging_batch2.description: Tagged 5 safety domain files with SSOT tags: safety/README.md, safety/__init__.py, audit_trail.py (AGI-20), blast_radius.py (AGI-19), kill_switch.py (AGI-18). Commit: ea7e5350d

decisions_made.bi_tools_fallback: Implemented self-contained fallback logic in BI tool adapters instead of restoring archived external scripts - maintains toolbelt functionality without dependency on deprecated tools
decisions_made.ssot_tagging_strategy: Domain-based batching approach (discord, core, config, safety) for efficient SSOT tagging execution with clear domain boundaries

tradeoffs.fallback_vs_restore: Implemented fallback implementations in BI tools vs restoring archived scripts - maintains functionality while respecting tool consolidation decisions
tradeoffs.batch_size: 5 files per batch chosen for manageable commit sizes and clear progress tracking vs larger batches
